question: i have had a twisted thigh bone since i was little can it be corrected?
question_content: my right thigh bone has been twisted for years but latley it gives me alot of pain i was wondering can they be corrected

answers.answer_content: It would probably have to be broken so it can heal properly. Doctors use this method often for bones that are out of place. It's a ligit medical procedure.
what you have is called femoral anteversion..try discusiing it with your doc...
